snippet: The video showing a subway encounter between a passenger and the rapper Jay-Z has brought my friend Ellen, an artist, much new attention. Of course, she also was called "an adorable old lady."
abstract: The video showing a subway encounter between a passenger and the rapper Jay-Z has brought my friend Ellen, an artist, much new attention. Of course, she also was called "an adorable old lady."

headline.main: When My Friend Ellen Grossman Met Jay-Z
